channel.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
channel.description:
Is The Xbox 360 Elite Gonna Be Worth It I Dont Think Its Worth It because These Are the Things They have Added: 1.Its Black -.- (You can Just Mod Your Old One) 2.120GB HDD (You Can Add To Your Xbox 360 Anyway) 3.It Has A HDMI Port (Uhmmsame as Above and who cares)
Things Which Should of Been Added (More Important) 1.Wi-Fi Dear GOD! 2.HD-DVD 3.Can't Support 1080p STILL! 4.Better Stats (ITS EXACTLY THE SAME AS THE XBOX 360 (Normal)) 5.It Will Cost $480 And The Sony Say There PS3 Is Going Down By $100 Soon So I Dont See A Point In Buying The console.
Personaly I Think This Console Is A Waste Of Time And Money And if You Already Have One Just Get The Upgrade's)
Tell me If You Think Im Wrong Tythus

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Alot of hardcore gamers would pick Xbox over PS3, Xbox is pretty nerdy and doesn’t exactly look cool…

A cool gamer would pick the PS3 because gangstas talk about PS3 and it looks so sexy.

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:27, topic:94924”][quote author=DeadBird link=topic=137334.msg1337189#msg1337189 date=1179543827]

Oblivion is a great game… pretty much the same as Xbox version but faster loading, better physics/animation and further draw distance… also comes with all the expansions… sucks that thwey fixed the glitches… which is why i love Xbox version better (duplicate and gold cheat).[/quote]
Shivering Isles (latest oblivion expansion) can’t be done on PS3 (currently at least). Memory limitations and Sony’s lack of support on PSN functions are holding it back.

[quote]Only because of the games and the fact its had a lot more time to “develop”.

Well, not really. 360 dev kits weren’t finished until the middle of '06. Before then they were modified G4 PowerMacs, which had about 25% of the 360s actual power. Gears did a lot of development on these. PS3 devkits were released as finished hardware.
[/quote]

Why do you hate the PS3 so much? Its amazing… as is the Xbox 360…[/quote]
As If You Are A Hard Core Gamer Like Moi And Like Goood Graphics Then I Pick The PS3

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“DeadBird, post:25, topic:94924”][quote author=goatee link=topic=137334.msg1336840#msg1336840 date=1179540696]
Oblivion is a great game… pretty much the same as Xbox version but faster loading, better physics/animation and further draw distance… also comes with all the expansions… sucks that thwey fixed the glitches… which is why i love Xbox version better (duplicate and gold cheat).[/quote]
Shivering Isles (latest oblivion expansion) can’t be done on PS3 (currently at least). Memory limitations and Sony’s lack of support on PSN functions are holding it back.

[quote]Only because of the games and the fact its had a lot more time to “develop”.
[/quote]
Well, not really. 360 dev kits weren’t finished until the middle of '06. Before then they were modified G4 PowerMacs, which had about 25% of the 360s actual power. Gears did a lot of development on these. PS3 devkits were released as finished hardware.[/quote]

Why do you hate the PS3 so much? Its amazing… as is the Xbox 360…

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

[quote=“DeadBird, post:22, topic:94924”][quote author=goatee link=topic=137334.msg1336031#msg1336031 date=1179529102]

I have a 360 and PS3, PS3 looks better, better physics but 360 has much better games.

I like PS3 cos you don’t have to pay for online play but 360 is only better because of the games, just wait a few months (October) and the PS3 will have plenty of good games.

Better physics? Care to show me what game has these groundbreaking physics so great you can tell which console does better? On games, release charts say: you’re wrong. LOL NO GAMES.

I hate topics like this, they never end well.

Hmm lets see, i have Oblivion on PS3 and Xbox 360, you can see immediatly from the start that when you walk into the chains on the xbox 360, they dont move very smoothly, whereas on the PS3 they move realistically.

Also PS3 does have more features than the Xbox 360. I still love my Xbox 360 though
[/quote]
That isn’t physics. It’s just animation.
Physics would be like…a falling castle? (I don’t know a good example)
Motorstorm has decent physics I admit, but a lackluster game overall. Hopefully they can polish up Motorstorm 2 to be a winnar.[/quote]
Physics Is Like If I Throw A Grenade Next To You You Get Blown Away More Realisticly And If You Hit A Rock While Doing That You Go Off that Alot More Realisticly.

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

goatee:

Oblivion is a great game… pretty much the same as Xbox version but faster loading, better physics/animation and further draw distance… also comes with all the expansions… sucks that thwey fixed the glitches… which is why i love Xbox version better (duplicate and gold cheat).

Shivering Isles (latest oblivion expansion) can’t be done on PS3 (currently at least). Memory limitations and Sony’s lack of support on PSN functions are holding it back.

Only because of the games and the fact its had a lot more time to "develop".
Well, not really. 360 dev kits weren't finished until the middle of '06. Before then they were modified G4 PowerMacs, which had about 25% of the 360s actual power. Gears did a lot of development on these. PS3 devkits were released as finished hardware.

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:23, topic:94924”]Some PS3 games:

Motorstorm is great fun… but only 8 tracks sucks dick.

Resistance is a good game, once through but not exactly visually stunning… physics are alright.

Oblivion is a great game… pretty much the same as Xbox version but faster loading, better physics/animation and further draw distance… also comes with all the expansions… sucks that thwey fixed the glitches… which is why i love Xbox version better (duplicate and gold cheat).

Some Xbox Games:

Ghost Recon 2: Very sexy, nice features and i like the sound of the guns firing.

Gears of War: AHMAGAD 10X better than resistance… its so sexy and you feel much more manly.

Oblivion: Owns cos i got the prepatch version (all the cheats work!)

Crackdown: WTF i like the game but its a bit… wierd.

Dunno why i posted it i felt it was a relevant comparing. And im not biassed(sp?).

I think you can see that atm Xbox is winning… Only because of the games and the fact its had a lot more time to “develop”. In october it will all change with Home and GTA. But maybe not cos GTA is on Xbox 360 aswell!! So many conflicts… I say Sony and Microsoft team up against Nintendo.[/quote]

Plus GTA on Xbox gets 2 extra levels for Xbox Live players only.

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?

Some PS3 games:

Ghost Recon 2: Very sexy, nice features and i like the sound of the guns firing.

Crackdown: WTF i like the game but its a bit… wierd.

Dunno why i posted it i felt it was a relevant comparing. And im not biassed(sp?).

I think you can see that atm Xbox is winning… Only because of the games and the fact its had a lot more time to “develop”. In october it will all change with Home and GTA. But maybe not cos GTA is on Xbox 360 aswell!! So many conflicts… I say Sony and Microsoft team up against Nintendo.

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

[quote]1.Its Black -.- (You can Just Mod Your Old One)[/quote] And void your warranty at the same time.
Fair Enough...but then your just paying for it to be black.
[quote]2.120GB HDD (You Can Add To Your Xbox 360 Anyway)[/quote] For $180.
This Was For Those People (Likely) Who Are Going To Buy An Elite Because They Think Its The Only One Which Can Have A 120GB HDD And Its Annoying.
[quote]3.It Has A HDMI Port (Uhmmsame as Above and who cares)[/quote] No you can't. MS had to do a (small) revision to the mobo for HDMI.
[quote]1.Wi-Fi Dear GOD![/quote] WiFi is useless for online gaming. Wire a CAT5 to your room like a real man.
I Connect To The Internet Through My Router Which Is WIRELESS ONLY NO WIRES! So I Dont Have A Choice Now Do I To Buy An Add On Which Connects By USB.
[quote]2.HD-DVD[/quote] Forcing an unproven format and raising the production costs when they're already losing is good in what way?
So I Have To Fork Out An Extra £130 For It Now Do I? And I Thought This Was The 'Elite' Console For The 'Hardcore Gamers'
[quote]3.Can't Support 1080p STILL![/quote] Uh, yes it does. HDMI was added for trueHD (1080p)
Is This In Games Or In Movies As I Heard Different Dont Quote Me On This Though
[quote]4.Better Stats (ITS EXACTLY THE SAME AS THE XBOX 360 (Normal))[/quote] It has the 120gb for basically $100 off. premium + 120gb drive = $580
Well Any New Thing Which The Normal Xbox 360 Cant Have Like You Can Install Linux On The PS3
[quote]5.It Will Cost $480 And The Sony Say There PS3 Is Going Down By $100 Soon So I Dont See A Point In Buying The console.[/quote] SCE said the opposite. They said no pricedrops are foreseeable until mid-2009.
Ive Heard Different From Videos And Reports Etc. -- [quote="Fr33sc4p3, post:2, topic:94924"]Non of them are worth it, i have the 360 and the ps3

PS3 ALL THE WAY[/quote]

Yes, a console with less games and features with a blatantly lying PR team - all the way!
So The Xbox 360 Had How Much Games At Launch And How Much Games Other Than Gears Of War Which Has Come Out A Year Or Two After Launch Which Where REAL Dineamite. [quote="tythus, post:6, topic:94924"][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=137334.msg1322533#msg1322533 date=1179246261] I have never heard of Xbox or PS3, all I have is a yellow gameboy and a playstation 1 <3 :P [/quote] [B]Please Say Your KIDDING![/B] PS3 = Verrry Gooood Hardware Xbox 360 = Verry Gooood Games [quote author=RXVL link=topic=137334.msg1322469#msg1322469 date=1179245003] 360 > Wii > PS3 I remember when Call of Duty 3 came out... On the second day of it being released my friend got best play in the world xD [/quote] Oh And Try Warhawk and motorstorm and resistance fall of man plus aswell you can install a working OS like ive installed windows vista as my alternate OS (OS=Operating System) So When Vista Only Games Come Out Such As Halo2 I Can Install Them On The PS3 Hopefully (^_^)[/quote]
Goodluck. 256mb RAM and no GPU access, that's sure going to blaze through vista and run Halo 2 at 60 fps!
It Works On XP Very Well =D [quote="goatee, post:7, topic:94924"]I have a 360 and PS3, PS3 looks better, better physics but 360 has much better games.

I like PS3 cos you don’t have to pay for online play but 360 is only better because of the games, just wait a few months (October) and the PS3 will have plenty of good games.[/quote]

Better physics? Care to show me what game has these groundbreaking physics so great you can tell which console does better? On games, release charts say: you're wrong. LOL NO GAMES.
Well There Are Games Coming Out And It's Only Within The Last Year Any Truely 'good' (GOW) Games Have Come Out For The Xbox 360 Which Are JUST For The Xbox 360 As Many Of The Games Which Came Out First For The XBOX 360 Are Out For PS3 And You Have To Wait A Little Bit Before Going Off About It And Search For PS3's Version Of Second Life 'Home' Which Is Second Life Squashed Into Xbox Live

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

1.Its Black -.- (You can Just Mod Your Old One)
And void your warranty at the same time.
2.120GB HDD (You Can Add To Your Xbox 360 Anyway)
For $180.
3.It Has A HDMI Port (Uhmmsame as Above and who cares)
No you can't. MS had to do a (small) revision to the mobo for HDMI.
1.Wi-Fi Dear GOD!
WiFi is useless for online gaming. Wire a CAT5 to your room like a real man.
2.HD-DVD
Forcing an unproven format and raising the production costs when they're already losing is good in what way?
3.Can't Support 1080p STILL!
Uh, yes it does. HDMI was added for trueHD (1080p)
4.Better Stats (ITS EXACTLY THE SAME AS THE XBOX 360 (Normal))
It has the 120gb for basically $100 off. premium + 120gb drive = $580
5.It Will Cost $480 And The Sony Say There PS3 Is Going Down By $100 Soon So I Dont See A Point In Buying The console.
SCE said the opposite. They said no pricedrops are foreseeable until mid-2009. -- [quote="Fr33sc4p3, post:2, topic:94924"]Non of them are worth it, i have the 360 and the ps3

PS3 ALL THE WAY[/quote]
Yes, a console with less games and features with a blatantly lying PR team - all the way!

[quote=“tythus, post:6, topic:94924”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=137334.msg1322533#msg1322533 date=1179246261]
I have never heard of Xbox or PS3, all I have is a yellow gameboy and a playstation 1 <3
[/quote]
Please Say Your KIDDING!
PS3 = Verrry Gooood Hardware
Xbox 360 = Verry Gooood Games

360 > Wii > PS3 I remember when Call of Duty 3 came out… On the second day of it being released my friend got best play in the world xD

Oh And Try Warhawk and motorstorm and resistance fall of man plus aswell you can install a working OS like ive installed windows vista as my alternate OS (OS=Operating System) So When Vista Only Games Come Out Such As Halo2 I Can Install Them On The PS3 Hopefully (^_^)[/quote]
Goodluck. 256mb RAM and no GPU access, that’s sure going to blaze through vista and run Halo 2 at 60 fps!

[quote=“goatee, post:7, topic:94924”]I have a 360 and PS3, PS3 looks better, better physics but 360 has much better games.

I like PS3 cos you don’t have to pay for online play but 360 is only better because of the games, just wait a few months (October) and the PS3 will have plenty of good games.[/quote]
Better physics? Care to show me what game has these groundbreaking physics so great you can tell which console does better? On games, release charts say: you’re wrong. LOL NO GAMES.

I hate topics like this, they never end well.

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @tythus tythus
item.description:
@tythus wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Who needs other crappy consoles when you have a computer? PS3 is here atm like 600 euros, what a waste don’t you think? My computer has 300GB hard drive and bought 400GB more, computer+400GB more = 955 euros. Don’t buy new stuff, you’re dumb.

Does It Have A Bluray and a crazily powerful proccesor and graphics card O.o

Read full topic

item.title: XBOX 360 Elite?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Rictoo:

The PS3 is literally a supercomputer. Check out the stats on Folding@Home, the PS3’s about 10-12 times more powerful than the average PC. There’s a problem with both the Xbox 360 and the PS3 though - the games (and software) cost money. Until they find a way to somehow channel software through some cracked-app server to the consoles, or something else, I’m not getting them

Xbox 360 games are supprisingly more expensive than PS3 games which are just a little bit more than PS2 games from £35-50 whereas Xbox 360 games are like £40-50

Read full topic
